metadata.title: Friday, 17th March, 2023
metadata.session: SECOND SESSION OF THE THIRTEENTH ASSEMBLY

questions.minister: Minister of Water Development  and Sanitation
parts: (a) whether the Government is aware that there has been a critical shortage of water, for the past two weeks, in Chikwanda area in Mpika Parliamentary Constituency; and
(b) if so, what urgent measures are being taken to resolve the water crisis and prevent water borne diseases.
(a) whether the Government is aware of the outbreak of measles in the following areas in Chinsali Parliamentary Constituency:
(b) if so, what urgent measures are being taken to contain the outbreak.
(a) whether the Government has any plans to establish a cotton ginnery plant in Chama District;
(b) if so, when the plans will be implemented; and
(c) if there are no such plans, why.

questions.minister: Minister of Infrastructure, Housing and Urban Development
parts: (a) when the construction of MulemaSampa Health Post in Malole Parliamentary Constituency will be completed;
(b) what the cause of delay in completing the project is; and
(c) what the time frame for the completion of the outstanding works is.

questions.minister: Minister of Water Development and Sanitation
